tweets.text: @WasteCrimeWatch @EnvAgency Honestly living with this is a nightmare I‚Äôm sat here crying I don‚Äôt know what else we can do we have no lives anymore can‚Äôt move because of work and why should we? What else can we do? #MentalHealthAwareness

The stench is horrendous again tonight, reported as far as Trentham, Blurton, Kidsgrove - difficult to breathe outside in #NUL and invading flat again. Trying to block doors and windows. Where are you @EnvAgency? This is horrendous. @StinkStopthe #stopthestink #capitoff
@Samanth33412592 @Tus_M_ @WasteCrimeWatch @EnvAgency ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è I'm so sorry. It's a living nightmare and never gets any easier. Sending love and strength xx

tweets.text: @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @DefraGovUK @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice @EnvAgency https://t.co/rPLmAPByCj

Walleys Quarry is located in a residential area and is impacting people for miles around the landfill. The noxious gases and odours are causing sleep deprivation, stress, anxiety, depression, headaches, migraines, nose bleeds, nausea, vomiting, breathing problems, and more.

@AcademicChatter and @PhDForum can you help by RTing? 1000s of people are suffering - mentally and physically - from daily exposure to gases & odours caused by a privately owned landfill (Walleys Quarry). H2S levels have exceeded WHO guidelines. Photos ‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/X5ZDGp5M28

Oh wonderful. It's my day off tomorrow so I was going to try & get some PhD work done, but I'm met with the familiar smell of hydrogen sulphide entering my home from Walleys Quarry. Looks like it'll be yet another sleepless night for our community, full of noxious gases & odours.

tweets.text: Any reprieve is welcome but always tinged with the knowledge that when it comes back it comes back with a vengeance @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice https://t.co/2ywWqksrJB https://t.co/tPaDmMnBrQ

@dpcarrington @Samanth33412592 @JournoJess_ &it‚Äôs not just the village of Silverdale,spreading across the borough&into Stoke on Trent. It‚Äôs in my house right now while my 3 year old https://t.co/JMA2QQ3Lf6 us- this is carcinogenic.The @EnvAgency have failed us.
We need govt to step in before deaths/cancer rates increase

Poor management and regulation. Many factors involved - inputs, capping, gas and leachate management. A strongly gassing landfill is a beast and yet ‚Å¶@EnvAgency‚Å© have allowed inexperienced operators permits across UK. Landfill gas is carcinogenic. https://t.co/2xoq9tB31q

tweets.text: @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe I really hope they don't wait for the summer when due to warm weather the gases will dispers into higher atmosphere. I really believe that the only other option we have it's court/law/ huge compensation.

@BarryNL @pippamaslin @hackbridgestink @plumeplotter @XRMerton @XRSutton @KingstonXR @XRCroydon @CroydonGreens @suttongreens @ElliotColburn The number of @LibDems rushing to defend actual exceeding @EnvAgency permit limits.... https://t.co/9otFsgLvFz

@Jane_C_Smith @EnvAgency And it‚Äôs spread from Silverdale. The stench and the health effects have spread across the borough. I live in the Westlands and have landfill gases in my home right now (windows closed) with a 3 year old. It‚Äôs a disaster & the govt need to access emergency funds #stopthestink
It‚Äôs far worse than anyone imagined. Our rivers are little more than open sewers. Raw sewage breaches in UK rivers are 10 times greater than @EnvAgency estimates https://t.co/fURw4paunH

@plumeplotter @BarryNL @pippamaslin @hackbridgestink @XRMerton @XRSutton @KingstonXR @XRCroydon @CroydonGreens @suttongreens @ElliotColburn @LibDems @EnvAgency A permit variation (EPR/TP3836CT/V004) was issued 17/8/20 when they wanted to burn 15% more than declared during planning process.

The #SLWP sub-committee discussed objecting to it thinking it was a future decision 4 months after it had been granted. https://t.co/VrxAeCEiqC

@BarryNL @MarkGale @pippamaslin @hackbridgestink @XRMerton @XRSutton @KingstonXR @XRCroydon @CroydonGreens @suttongreens @ElliotColburn @LibDems @EnvAgency They are in the @EnvAgency permit, and there isn't a quota of the number of times the limit can be exceeded. They just report that number in their reports to @EnvAgency.

@BarryNL @MarkGale @pippamaslin @hackbridgestink @XRMerton @XRSutton @KingstonXR @XRCroydon @CroydonGreens @suttongreens @ElliotColburn @LibDems @EnvAgency You're talking about a completely different issue (limits on ambient air pollution). @MarkGale was talking about the limit on emission concentration. The half-hour limit is 200 mg/m3 (not ¬µg/m3) and they exceeded that limit.

tweets.text: Works to improve the surface water drainage system on Burnley Road in #Mytholmroyd will be complete this Friday 14 May. tweets.text:
It is unacceptable that MPs accused of breaching the Code of Conduct are unable to publicly defend themselves when their names are published. This defies natural justice.

Earlier today, I raised a Point of Order in @HouseofCommons on this issue. https://t.co/4hqkAg1HVn

tweets.text: Pleased Environment Agency is meeting with campaigners to discuss Welsh Harp next week. Not so pleased at state of River Brent trash trap today. Grills still bent & broken 50m from protected wetland. Is regular maintenance really that hard, @EnvAgencySE? https://t.co/1LMca3vLbL

Don‚Äôt know you cope Ann, you‚Äôre much closer than us & my heart breaks when I read your posts ‚ù§Ô∏è One day closer to closure & restoration. We will NOT give up @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency #stopthestink https://t.co/UW8n2y90Ob

We‚Äôre working with @EnvAgency and local authorities to develop strategies which harness the power of nature to reduce the impact of flooding and coastal change to our communities and environment. #TogetherForNature  #NatureRecovery #FCERMStrategy https://t.co/C2zwW7j7rF

tweets.text: @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice @BorisJohnson The @EnvAgency enforcement budget has been cut by around 50% since 2010 I believe, and their obligations have extended too, so less money but more to do. It doesn't excuse their lack of action, but it does somewhat explain it. The @EnvAgency are the government's responsibility.

@SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe That reprieve didn‚Äôt last long. Just had a quick gassing. Lingering in the house now #stopthestink

@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency  This is getting tedious. What are you planning to do to sort this problem? It‚Äôs disgusting, it‚Äôs unhealthy, it‚Äôs poisonous, it‚Äôs depressing. Sort it out now!  #StopTheStink https://t.co/QgNt05ZsLk

Newcastle was a happy enough place, 
‚ÄòTil one day came a greedy red face, 
Gassed in their beds, 
EA left them for dead,
To make room for more festering waste
